title: Teaching one child at a time
description: Educating the poor is more than just a numbers game, says Shukla Bose. She tells the story of her groundbreaking Parikrma Humanity Foundation, which brings hope to India's slums by looking past the daunting statistics and focusing on treating each child as an individual.
author: Shukla Bose
keywords: TED, talks, children, education, poverty, teaching, global development, india
